mapper.sql: id, fk_dialysis_campaign_id, fk_patient_id, dialysis_date, dialysis_time, actual_dialysis_time, advance_time, start_time, end_time, stop_reason_type, stop_reason_desc, del_flag, operator_id, fk_tenant_id, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id
mapper.insert: insert into dialysis_exception_stop (id, fk_dialysis_campaign_id, fk_patient_id, dialysis_date, dialysis_time, actual_dialysis_time, advance_time, start_time, end_time, stop_reason_type, stop_reason_desc, del_flag, operator_id, fk_tenant_id, create_time, create_user_id, update_time, update_user_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fkDialysisCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fkPatientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dialysisDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dialysisTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actualDialysisTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{advanceTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stopReasonType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stopReasonDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update dialysis_exception_stop
fk_dialysis_campaign_id = #{fkDialysisCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fk_patient_id = #{fkPatientId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dialysis_date = #{dialysisDate,jdbcType=DATE},
dialysis_time = #{dialysisTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
actual_dialysis_time = #{actualDialysisTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
advance_time = #{advanceTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
stop_reason_type = #{stopReasonType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stop_reason_desc = #{stopReasonDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dialysis_exception_stop set fk_dialysis_campaign_id = #{fkDialysisCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fk_patient_id = #{fkPatientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, dialysis_date = #{dialysisDate,jdbcType=DATE}, dialysis_time = #{dialysisTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, actual_dialysis_time = #{actualDialysisTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, advance_time = #{advanceTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, stop_reason_type = #{stopReasonType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stop_reason_desc = #{stopReasonDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user_id = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select.foreach: SELECT #{item.model} AS model,DATE_FORMAT(#{item.startTime}, '%Y-%m') m,count(des.id) AS count FROM dialysis_exception_stop des WHERE des.fk_tenant_id = #{item.tenantId} AND des.stop_reason_type IS NOT NULL AND (des.create_time BETWEEN #{item.startTime} AND #{item.endTime})

mapper.select: SELECT p.name as patientName , des.start_time , des.end_time , des.dialysis_time , des.actual_dialysis_time , des.advance_time , des.stop_reason_type , des.stop_reason_desc FROM dialysis_exception_stop des LEFT JOIN patient p ON des.fk_patient_id = p.id WHERE des.fk_tenant_id = #{fkTenantId} AND des.end_time IS NOT NULL AND des.stop_reason_type IS NOT NULL AND (des.create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}) order by des.end_time desc
